alert.note: Alert for Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 21 at 2:01PM MDT until August 21 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, AND 317... .Hot, dry, and breezy weather continues this afternoon. Highs will climb into the mid to upper 90s, with relative humidity values falling below 15 percent. Southwest winds sustained at 15 to 20 mph with frequent gusts to 30 mph can be expected. These factors will combine to produce critical fire weather conditions. ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 314, 315, AND 317... * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 314 Northern Campbell, 315 Southern Campbell and 317 Weston County Plains. * WINDS...Southwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 30 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 14 percent. * IMPACTS...The combination of gusty winds and low relative humidity will produce critical fire weather conditions.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Northern Campbell; Southern Campbell; Weston County Plains
